subject: [cc-devel] Embedded License Format, OO.org
body:
Hey Cassio,

My SoC project is extracting license metadata for Tracker, and so I'll
be extracting metadata from OpenOffice documents.  Has the form of the
license metadata in OO files been decided yet?  When I get this, I can
start working on extracting this metadata (No hurry... there's plenty of
other formats to pin down).  When available, a post to the mailing list
or techblog  outlining this would be very useful.

Cheers,
Jason
_______________________________________________
cc-devel mailing list

http://lists.ibiblio.org/mailman/listinfo/cc-devel
